statements: DELETE FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE enrollment_year = 2018 AND major = 'Computer Science';

DELETE FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE enrollment_year < 2015 AND credits_completed > 120 AND major = 'Computer Science';
